fields.title: Senior Software Engineer, Reliability Engineering
fields.achievements:
- Multi-cloud user and group synchronization system integrated with cloud provider SCIM
- GovSlack Directly Responsible Individual (DRI)
- Developed cross-partition artifact verification and copying service
- Maintainer of Service Owner Catalog @ Slack
- Drove internal production ownership through personas, user stories, and roadmapping
- Championed OpenAPIv3 end-to-end generation as a service development pattern
- Developed team project intake process, streamlining and increasing external contributions
- Drove adoption of Athens Proxy greatly increasing developer productivity and reliability of Go artifacts
- Developed automated service level objective (SLO) program
- Over 1,000 yearly contributions (reviews, commits, pull requests, issues) on GitHub

fields.title: Staff Software Engineer (Lead Engineer, IDPS)
fields.achievements:
- Implemented a new authentication method for appliance management APIs based on non-static credentials
- Led the development and maintenance of six products (Java, Go, Node, Python SDKs + developer platform + CLI) with 2-3 engineers
- Served as escalation support for bugs and incidents
- Designed and led rewrite of secrets & key management CLI
- Replatformed all microservices onto a custom Kubernetes implementation (EKS-based)
- Designed and led production of a CLI workflow management utility for Kubernetes users
- Implemented agile rituals (retrospectives, action items) leading to demonstrated backlog reduction
- Designed next-gen capability negotiation between backend services and client SDKs
- Oversaw acquisition and retrofit of an init-container based secrets fetching solution

fields.title: Staff Site Reliability Engineer (API Gateway & Kubernetes Service)
fields.achievements:
- Led the company in on-boarding to SELinux and Amazon Linux 2 simultaneously for Intuit API Gateway
- Helped design patterns and training docs for other teams to onboard to SELinux quickly
- Led successful audits for CCPA, PCI, and Indiana Department of Revenue
- Led a POC around reinventing our internal secrets solution to be Kubernetes native
- As an SRE: average concurrent RPS >600k for Intuit API Gateway and Intuit Kubernetes Service
- Maintained Intuit API Gateway's systems infrastructure with Chef, Python
- Developed, as a team member, on Intuit Kubernetes Service v1/v2 (Python/GoLang)
- Advised on implementation for DR strategies and wrote the systems feature that enabled full restoral from nothing on Intuit API Gateway
- Built out POC Golden signals dashboards that was used during peak season
- Provided mentorship for colleagues as part of a mentorship program
- Provided community support for GoLang and mentored new Go developers
- Forked and developed an internal version of GoDoc.org for use within Intuit
- Contributed features back to kubernetes/kops (Kubernetes Operations) and other FOSS projects
- Wrote a POC self-service application syncing VMWare Wavefront dashboards and alerts from a Git repo
- Led a project to improve the secrets delivery experience inside containers
  - Designed and benchmarked a new secrets delivery system
  - Improved security posture by reducing attack surface
  - Reduced latency by 50% through optimized caching
- Designed and wrote a GitOps based orchestration utility to synchronize Kubernetes clusters and their configuration

fields.name: Matt
fields.bio: My name is Matt. I'm a software engineer that has made a career building software that eases service ownership, reliability, and security burdens. I enjoy working with curious, hard working, and ambitious teams.
